base_description: Rectangular, grey box with a flat top.
part_description: Comprises a main rectangular body with a flat top surface. No visible handles or openings. Smooth, uniform surface with sharp edges.
internal_interaction_description: The object appears to be a solid structure with no visible internal parts or mechanisms. Its uniform shape suggests it is a single piece, with no internal components interacting with each other.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces and interacts with the environment as a standalone unit. It may serve as a storage or support surface, interacting with other objects placed on or around it.
